detailed_summary:
# Summary of Ellah Lakes Plc Annual General Meeting Notice

## Purpose and Nature of the Disclosure
This document serves as a formal notice for the Annual General Meeting (AGM) of Ellah Lakes Plc, detailing the rescheduled date, location, agenda items, and compliance measures related to the COVID-19 pandemic.

## Key Dates
- **Original AGM Date:** Friday, 8 October 2021
- **Rescheduled AGM Date:** Monday, 22 November 2021
- **Time:** 11:00 AM
- **Closure of Register of Members/Transfer Books:** From Monday, 8 November 2021 to Friday, 12 November 2021 (both dates inclusive)
- **Deadline for Proxy Submission:** Not less than 48 hours before the scheduled time of the meeting
- **Deadline for Questions Submission:** Not later than 7 days before the date of the meeting

## Location
- **Venue:** The Workstation, No. 7 Ibiyinka Olorunbe Close, Victoria Island, Lagos, Nigeria

## Directors Mentioned
- Olu Akpata
- Chuka Mordi
- Shehu Abubakar
- Osaro Oyegun
- Evans Jakpa-Johns
- Maxwell Oko
- Nnenna Onyewuchi
- Enotie Ogbebor
- Chijioke Dozie
- Hauwa Nuru
- Joe Attueyi
- Charles Anajemba

## Agenda Items
### Ordinary Business
1. Presentation of the audited financial statements for the year ended 31 July 2021, along with reports from the Directors, auditors, and audit committee.
2. Re-election of Directors retiring by rotation.
3. Re-appointment of Olabode Akande & Co. as the auditors of the Company.
4. Authorization for the directors to fix the remuneration of auditors.
5. Disclosure of the remuneration of the Managers of the Company in accordance with Section 257 of the Companies & Allied Matters Act 2020.
6. Election of members of the audit committee.

### Special Business
1. Consideration of an ordinary resolution to authorize the board of directors to list the shares of the Company on the London Stock Exchange.

## Compliance Matters
- The AGM will adhere to the Corporate Affairs Commission (CAC) guidelines regarding gatherings and social distancing due to the COVID-19 pandemic.
- Attendance at the AGM will be by proxy only, in compliance with CAC guidelines.

## Proxy Information
- Members entitled to attend and vote may appoint a proxy, who need not be a member.
- The proxy form is included in the annual report and must be completed, stamped by the Commissioner of Stamp Duties, and submitted to Cardinal Stone Registrars Limited at 358 Herbert Macaulay Way, Yaba, Lagos.
- The Company will cover the cost of stamping proxy forms submitted within the stipulated time.

## Online Streaming
- The AGM will be streamed live via Zoom, with the link provided to shareholders at least 48 hours before the meeting.

## Audit Committee Nominations
- Shareholders may nominate another shareholder for appointment to the audit committee, with nominations to be submitted in writing to the company secretary at least 21 days before the AGM.

## Shareholdersâ€™ Rights
- Shareholders have the right to ask questions during the AGM and may submit questions in writing to the company secretary via email at secretariat@oakelegal.com prior to the meeting.

## Document Date
- The notice is dated 5 October 2021.

## Company Secretary
- OAKE Legal is the Company Secretary responsible for the notice and related communications.
